posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I'm trying to diversify my collection. I won a T332 Helmar Baseball Stamp the other day and I'm interested with the set. I was wondering if any of you guys have some for sale? Thanks!

Best regards,
Joshua Wasilewski

Take a look at my "for sale" page on my imageevent site.  I have many, many duplicates.  Most of my duplicates are at the bottom of that page.  I don't have prices listed, but I'm happy to work something out to help you get going with this difficult set.  

The set is certainly fun and difficult, but it's not too pricey.  I still have two more needed for completion and I began working on this set starting in 2013.
PM sent -  I have five available.
